程序包 org.hibernate.validator.internal.util.classhierarchy

Contains classes for working with the elements of a class hierarchy.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Filter
    A filter to be used when invoking ClassHierarchyHelper.getHierarchy(Class, Filter...).
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ClassHierarchyHelper
    Helper class for dealing with inheritance hierarchies of given types which allows to selectively retrieve elements from such hierarchies, e.g. all super-classes, all implemented interfaces etc.
    Filters
    Provides filters to be used when invoking ClassHierarchyHelper.getHierarchy(Class, Filter...).

程序包org.hibernate.validator.internal.util.classhierarchy的说明

Contains classes for working with the elements of a class hierarchy.
